users.about:
The Boston-based Tom Morris, not the English one.

Note: edits attributed to Google /accounts/o8/id?id=AItOawkUYZLiY2Is7TTzaNKpyVGfNO199Tkw6MQ are by me as well, but they have apparently become disassociated with my account.
users.name: tfmorris

description:
This group comprises open bibliographic datasets according to the [Principles on Open Bibliographic Data](http://openbiblio.net/principles) and a few not yet really open bibliographic datasets.

It is maintained by members of the [OKFN Working Group on Open Bibliographic Data](http://openbiblio.net/).
name: bibliographic
title: Bibliographic Data
